EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Series: The New Rules of Retail Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly: What it means to be a grocery store retailer at {{company.Company Name:default=your store}} isn’t what it meant even six months ago. Consumers are trying new technologies. Safety now drives loyalty. And the retail tech investments you’d planned—now maybe have moved up or down on your list of priorities. We’ve conducted some research on exactly these trends to help you make sense of it all. Download the ebook <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/food-drug-mass-merchandise/ebook-decoding-retail?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2020_07_DecodingGrocery_Campaign_Retail&utm_content=email1&utm_industry=Retail&utm_sub-industry=Grocery_&_Mass_Merchants]]> to see some of the eye-opening results as you rethink what transformation means in a COVID-era world. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
